name: Army Target Sniper
description:
Make the best sniping strategy to destroy your enemies in this snipers mission! As this Americans sniper acts like rail shooter and eliminate each and every enemy by targeting and shoot them. It's time to show some ultimate sniping skills. Many challenges are waiting for you as you attack enemy

Fulfill US duty that require protection from terrorist attack. Let not your energy level down during the counter strike against the invasion. Get hold of your long range snipers rifle, Set your aim and pull the trigger to destroy your enemy. Make sure you keep yourself well focused and determined before firing your first shot. Please be careful and look around to prevent the enemies from SHOOTING on you.

Features:
- Ultra realistic 3D graphics and cool animations
- Hundreds of thrilling missions
- Tons of lethal guns and mortal weapons
- Addicting FPS gameplay
- Easy and intuitive controls
- Free game
